text: Torre Beretti e Castellaro is a comune in the Province of Pavia in the Lombardy region in Italy. It is about 60 km southwest of Milan and about 40 km southwest of Pavia. As of 31 December 2004, 604 people lived there. It has an area of 17.5 kmÂ².All demographics and other statistics: Italian statistical institute Istat. Torre Beretti e Castellaro is next to these municipalities: Bozzole, Frascarolo, Mede, Sartirana Lomellina, Valenza. == Demographic change == Colors= id:lightgrey value:gray(0.9) id:darkgrey
